participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, with a passion for education and community involvement.
participant_1.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: ambitious and down-to-earth, with a strong connection to his rural roots and a desire to help others through law.
participant_2.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i'm from a small town.
